default.introduction: Hello! I'm the AI assistant for Example Store, an online retailer of eco-friendly products. How can I assist you today?

shopping.introduction: Welcome to Example Store! We offer a wide range of eco-friendly products with free shipping on orders over $50. Our most popular categories include kitchen supplies, personal care, and home goods.

business.introduction: Example Store provides sustainable product solutions for businesses of all sizes. We offer bulk discounts, corporate gifting, and custom branding options.

support.introduction: Welcome to Example Store support! How can I help you today? I can assist with order tracking, returns, product information, or general questions about our eco-friendly merchandise.
